cache.name: cache
cache.create:
CREATE TABLE `cache` (
  `cache_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `cache_uri` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `cache_content` longtext NOT NULL,
  `cache_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`cache_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_general_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

contact.name: contact
contact.create:
CREATE TABLE `contact` (
  `contact_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `contact_nickname` text NOT NULL,
  `contact_fullname` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `contact_image` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  PRIMARY KEY (`contact_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_general_ci

contact_meta.name: contact_meta
contact_meta.create:
CREATE TABLE `contact_meta` (
  `contact_meta_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `contact_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `contact_meta_name` text NOT NULL,
  `contact_meta_content` text NOT NULL,
  `contact_meta_primary` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`contact_meta_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_general_ci

data.name: data
data.create:
CREATE TABLE `data` (
  `data_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `data_name` tinytext NOT NULL,
  `data_slug` text NOT NULL,
  `data_content` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `data_type` varchar(25) NOT NULL,
  `data_parent` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `data_status` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  PRIMARY KEY (`data_id`) USING HASH,
  KEY `data_type` (`data_type`),
  KEY `data_parent` (`data_parent`),
  KEY `data_id` (`data_id`,`data_type`,`data_parent`),
  KEY `data_id_2` (`data_id`,`data_parent`),
  KEY `data_id_3` (`data_id`,`data_type`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_swedish_ci

data_meta.name: data_meta
data_meta.create:
CREATE TABLE `data_meta` (
  `data_meta_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `data_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `data_meta_name` varchar(25) NOT NULL,
  `data_meta_content` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`data_meta_id`),
  KEY `data_id` (`data_id`),
  KEY `data_meta_name` (`data_meta_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_swedish_ci

history.name: history
history.create:
CREATE TABLE `history` (
  `history_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `data_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `history_val` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`history_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_general_ci

role.name: role
role.create:
CREATE TABLE `role` (
  `role_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `role_title` text NOT NULL,
  `role_permissions` longtext NOT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`role_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_general_ci

route.name: route
route.create:
CREATE TABLE `route` (
  `route_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `route_ord` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `route_controller` text NOT NULL,
  `route_ext` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `ext_primary` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `route_slug` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `route_admin` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `in_h_nav` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `in_f_nav` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `nav_display` tinytext DEFAULT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `user_key` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`route_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_swedish_ci

session.name: session
session.create:
CREATE TABLE `session` (
  `session_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `session_key` text NOT NULL,
  `session_ip` text NOT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`session_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_general_ci

user.name: user
user.create:
CREATE TABLE `user` (
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_role` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `contact_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_verified` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `user_email` text NOT NULL,
  `user_pass` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_salt` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_role_mods` longtext DEFAULT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_key`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_general_ci

var.name: var
var.create:
CREATE TABLE `var` (
  `var_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `var_session` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `var_name` text NOT NULL,
  `var_content` text NOT NULL,
  `var_type` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL,
  `create_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `last_edit` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `user_key` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`var_id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_general_ci
